ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 8 Date: Thu, 23 Sep 1999 19:49:14 -0700 From: K  Subject: Re: help please I have done this quest. I had no problem with the
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 8
Date: Thu, 23 Sep 1999 19:49:14 -0700
From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>
Subject: Re: help please

I have done this quest. I had no problem with the lion spawning; are you

sure you are opening the right door?
I went to that door frist and nothing happen, then I went to the others.

None of the doors are locked. I can click the door to open it.

The guy says 'the left hand door in the wall of three' I think... double

check and open that door first.
Yep, did that.

Also I did this quest before the patch, it is possible that it may have
been
broken. If you continue to not find the lion, petition about it as well
as
email questhelp@....
Ah, thank you I did not know that you could do that, thank you
I will do that.

Good Hunting to you and thank you.
